ygData.subject: [eqbards] Oh God, You Devil! (was - Overthere to Oasis)
ygData.msgSnippet: I chose Karana for the whole, wind at your back brave adventurer thing. My luck the deity item will be druid only. I ve been wondering something about deity
ygData.messageBody:
I chose Karana for the whole, wind at your back brave adventurer thing.
My luck the deity item will be druid only.

I've been wondering something about deity choices. I went through and
found (could have missed one) that only bards can worship Veeshan. It
hurts your faction everywhere to do so, I'm wondering if any of you
choose the big lizard in the sky.

Ninev Rudeflute
34 and notes: Nostrolo Tambourine has no graphic, is that good?
E'ci

--- "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> Some of us were actually hoping to see some deity related items that
> aren't
> Innouruk specific. I would think a fair number of bards actually
> chose a
> deity for reasons other than convenience. Well, one can hope anyhow.
>
> Kit
>
